comment_reactions_tenant_isolation.name: comment_reactions_tenant_isolation

post_roadmaps_tenant_isolation.name: post_roadmaps_tenant_isolation

post_tags_tenant_isolation.name: post_tags_tenant_isolation

changelog_tenant_isolation.name: changelog_tenant_isolation
changelog_tenant_isolation.using:
board_id IN (
  SELECT id FROM boards
  WHERE organization_id = current_setting('app.organization_id', true)
)
changelog_tenant_isolation.withCheck:
board_id IN (
  SELECT id FROM boards
  WHERE organization_id = current_setting('app.organization_id', true)
)

notification_preferences_tenant_isolatio.name: notification_preferences_tenant_isolation
notification_preferences_tenant_isolatio.using:
member_id IN (
  SELECT id FROM member
  WHERE organization_id = current_setting('app.organization_id', true)
)
notification_preferences_tenant_isolatio.withCheck:
member_id IN (
  SELECT id FROM member
  WHERE organization_id = current_setting('app.organization_id', true)
)

post_subscriptions_tenant_isolation.name: post_subscriptions_tenant_isolation
post_subscriptions_tenant_isolation.using:
post_id IN (
  SELECT p.id FROM posts p
  JOIN boards b ON p.board_id = b.id
  WHERE b.organization_id = current_setting('app.organization_id', true)
)
post_subscriptions_tenant_isolation.withCheck:
post_id IN (
  SELECT p.id FROM posts p
  JOIN boards b ON p.board_id = b.id
  WHERE b.organization_id = current_setting('app.organization_id', true)
)
